name: Alien Spaceship
uniques: Must be adjacent to [3] to [6] [Tundra] tiles
Neighboring tiles will convert to [Spaceship Debris]
Tile provides yield without assigned population

civilopediaText.text: While it still looks impressive, it will never fly to the stars again. The survivors have simply decided to wait for rescue and have fun while doing so.

name: Spaceship Debris
uniques: Considered [Food] when determining start locations <in [Tundra] Regions>
Considered [Production] when determining start locations <in [Tundra] Regions>

civilopediaText.text: The junk that fell from the sky here can still be scavenged to some extent.

name: King Solomon's Mines
uniques: Must be adjacent to [0] to [2] [Mountain] tiles

name: Mount Kilimanjaro
uniques: Must be adjacent to [2] to [6] [Hill] tiles
Must be adjacent to [0] to [2] [Mountain] tiles
Grants [Altitude Training] ([double movement and +10% Strength in hills]) to adjacent [Land] units for the rest of the game
